titleStmt.title: A panegyrick of King Charles being observations upon the inclination, life, and government of our Soveraign Lord the King / written by Sir Henry Wotton ...
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Henry, Sir, 1568-1639.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
